author: veithen
msg: Fix build failure: the bootclasspath property conflicts with a property used by maven-javadoc-plugin.

author: rec
msg: [UIMA-4580] Findbugs (and others) fail on Java 8 CI build
- Added profiles for cobertura, pmd, and findbugs
- Use property to configure source encoding
- Use properties to configure java source/target versions and inject them into plugins where needed. (I believe 1.7 works for javadoc as well as 7 did before)
